title: Counter Strike 1.6 [BOTS + NEW MAPS]
description:
Counter-Strike 1.6
*******************

Game description:

Counter Strike - cult multiplayer first-person shooter, which was released back in 2000 and still remains the most popular shooter and at the same time a major professional tournament game.
The basic idea of the game: Confrontation between the two teams - Terrorists and Counter-Terrorists.
Goal: Complete card or destroy the enemy. For an assignment, and destruction of the enemy player gets the money that can be spent on buying arms, ammunition and equipment.
Depending on the type of card game plot can be different:
Clearance: Terrorists attack produce feed exploding a bomb in a certain place, Terrorists should in turn prevent explosion or eliminate all terrorists.
Rescue hostages terrorists captured and held hostage. Terrorists should release the hostages, having them in the evacuation zone.
Kill VIP: Terrorists kill feed a very important person (VIP). Task Counter-Terrorists safely spend VIP to a safe zone.

Installer components:

Counter-Strike 1.6 version: Protocol version 48
Exe version 1.1.2.6 (cstrike)
Exe build: 16:05:41 Jun 15 2009 (4554)
- Softonic text
- Softonic radio
- Bots zbot
- Crack of radio bots
- Upgraded theme
- Music on the menu
- Logos (227 pcs.)
- Master server search servers
- SETTI - Pirate servers
- Is invulnerable to slowhack plugins (autoconnect, gamemenu... etc)
- Originals models of cs 1.6
- No lag, no choke, no loss!
- New maps

All of these items are not selected by default. That is, if you do not choose when installing these components, you will have a clean Counter-Strike 1.6, without any unnecessary files and modifications.

System Requirements

Recommended:
- CPU with a clock speed of 800 MHz or higher
- 128 MB of RAM
- 32 MB card +
- 650 MB of free disk space
- Operating system Windows 2000/XP/Vista/7/8
- Mouse, keyboard
- Internet access

CD KeY: AAAAA-AAAAA-AAAAA-AAAAA-AAAAA or 5RP2E-EPH3K-BR3LG-KMGTE-FN8PY

*IMPORTANT* If the game not work wiew this video: "#CS Work" er is in the Counter Strike folder or run the game with Cstrike.exe, er is in Counter-Strike 1.6 folder.
